page.title: 05GHOST STORY
page.content: It is thought that a murder was commited in Condover Hall.A squire and his son had a fight and the son killed his father.When they were fighting the father made an imprint of a blood stained hand on the stairs.The son accused his butler,John Viam,of the murder,and he was hanged at Shrewsbury.Before he died he put a curse on Condover Hall saying that no heir to the Hall would live.This curse has been fulfilled.For years after,a blood stained hand has appeared on the stairs leading to the basement.When workmen chipped away the stone the hand disappeared.
